original: 廣漢郪人，先後出仕蜀漢、曹魏、西晉。對蜀漢君臣時勢多有一針見血的批評，言詞間對蜀漢有深切的緬懷遺憾之情。
text: Guanghan Li people, successively went to the Shu Han, Cao Wei, and Western Jin Dynasty. There are often sharp criticisms of the times of the Shuhan monarchs and his officials, and there is deep cherishment and regret for the Shuhan in words.
